get.desc: Get all Application Insights web tests defined for the specified resource group.

200.desc: A list containing 0 or more web test definitions.

put.desc: Creates or updates an Application Insights web test definition.

params.name: WebTestDefinition
params.desc: Properties that need to be specified to create or update an Application Insights web test definition.

200.desc: Successfully created or updated an Application Insights web test.
